description: Explore the role of Arbitrum in enhancing blockchain scalability through off-chain computations. Learn how it improves transaction throughput, reduces costs, and offers a robust solution for Ethereum-compatible smart contracts. Understand the mechanics, benefits, and challenges of Arbitrum's innovative Layer 2 technology.
keywords: Arbitrum, blockchain scalability, off-chain computations, Layer 2 solutions, Ethereum, smart contracts, rollups, transaction throughput, blockchain technology, Offchain Labs
title: Arbitrum and the Future of Off-Chain Computations in Blockchain Technology
